channel.title: I-Bot svn, V2 movie preview!
channel.description:
Well since my server is down due to raw i will be using this svn: svn checkout: http://OpenSVN.csie.org/IBot
javadocs included.
<I-Bot [b]V2[/b]> preview video: http://www.uploadit.biz/download.php?filename=001948635.avi
Things needed to do [b]before[/b] release:
[ul][li]kill raw[/li][li]re-written input thread[/li][li]compass[/li][/ul]
CHANGES:
[ul][li]pixle data stored in short[x][y][3], no longer int[x][y][/li][li]The move from int to short arrays has boosted performance by 30%[/li][li]every core method changed and with the changing came many bugfixes and testing[/li][li]ALL OCR was re-written[/li][li]toptext is now 98% correct (was 50%)[/li][li]getchat is now 100% correct (was 90%) [/li][/ul]
[b]New[/b] Things
[ul][li]getEnergy()[/li][li]setRun(boolean)[/li][li]isMapFlagUp()[/li][li]distanceMapToFlag()[/li][li]inventoryCount()[/li][li]itemExist(int)[/li][li]getStatTop(int)[/li][li]getStatBottom(int)[/li][li]getMenu() (returns a [b]MENU[/b] object containing all text of the menu and each rectange to click on for each slot)[/li][/ul]
You may ask how the did i get toptext to be so good. I use the
[ul][li]black shadow of the characters,[/li][li]bitmasks[/li][li]don't allow black to be the bitmask[/li][li]tolerances on both the black shadow and on the bitmask[/li][li]spaces are 1px and 3 spaces are converted to a real space[/li][li]yes bitmask and bitmaps are used together, every bitmap can contain both bitmaps and bitmask, also all methods can handle this.[/li][/ul] </I-Bot [b]V2[/b]>

item.title: I-Bot svn, V2 movie preview!
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

ruler:

it would take hours to dl each files seperatly thru the browser lol

That it did.

The new additions you’re planning sound pretty sweet. Glad to see I-Bot not going down cuz of RaW.

Also i am willing to build guis for scripts. If you work out the logic of the script i can do the gui.

I’m pretty good with GUI’s, but still don’t like them much. If I decide that I need a nice one (maybe if my scripts become good enough to be sold), then I know how to talk to.

Read full topic

item.title: I-Bot svn, V2 movie preview!
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

it would take hours to dl each files seperatly thru the browser lol

Things i am going to add:
faster algotrims (as if they arn’t fast enough already lol)

Menu class
Basically gets all the info about the menu that is on screen!
Text, Rectangles,ect.

Also i am willing to build guis for scripts. If you work out the logic of the script i can do the gui.

move from int [x ][y] to short [x ][y][3] 3-> r,g,b

Read full topic

item.title: I-Bot svn, V2 movie preview!
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

Woot! Thanks ruler. Now I get to continue work on scripts.

Hmm, I’ll probably release my Flax0r after I get it tested, which shouldn’t be hard now that this is here.

Only thing I can complain about was how dumb I was for downloading each individual file manually. (Those BMP’s were a bitch.) But meh, that’s an error on my part.

Read full topic

item.title: I-Bot svn, V2 movie preview!
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

Well since my server is down due to raw i will be using this svn:
svn checkout:
http://OpenSVN.csie.org/IBot

javadocs included.

<I-Bot V2>
preview video:
http://www.uploadit.biz/download.php?filename=001948635.avi

Things needed to do before release:

[ul][li]kill raw[/li][li]re-written input thread[/li][li]compass[/li][/ul]

CHANGES:

[ul][li]pixle data stored in short[x][y][3], no longer int[x][y][/li][li]The move from int to short arrays has boosted performance by 30%[/li][li]every core method changed and with the changing came many bugfixes and testing[/li][li]ALL OCR was re-written[/li][li]toptext is now 98% correct (was 50%)[/li][li]getchat is now 100% correct (was 90%) [/li][/ul]

New Things

[ul][li]getEnergy()[/li][li]setRun(boolean)[/li][li]isMapFlagUp()[/li][li]distanceMapToFlag()[/li][li]inventoryCount()[/li][li]itemExist(int)[/li][li]getStatTop(int)[/li][li]getStatBottom(int)[/li][li]getMenu() (returns a MENU object containing all text of the menu and each rectange to click on for each slot)[/li][/ul]

You may ask how the did i get toptext to be so good. I use the

[ul][li]black shadow of the characters,[/li][li]bitmasks[/li][li]don’t allow black to be the bitmask[/li][li]tolerances on both the black shadow and on the bitmask[/li][li]spaces are 1px and 3 spaces are converted to a real space[/li][li]yes bitmask and bitmaps are used together, every bitmap can contain both bitmaps and bitmask, also all methods can handle this.[/li][/ul]
</I-Bot V2>
